remarks: Norm of a scalar product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphnmvs.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cphnmvs.n $e |- N = ( norm ` W ) $.
cphnmvs.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
cphnmvs.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
cphnmvs.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
cphnmvs $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. K /\ Y e. V ) -> ( N ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( ( abs ` X ) x. ( N ` Y ) ) ) $.
